Class OrderList

java.lang.Object
  OrderList

public class OrderList
extends java.lang.Object

Class for managing orders. The class holds a protected array list of orders.

Author:
Mikey

Constructor Detail

public OrderList()
Constructor with no arguments, create a new empty array list of orders.

Method Detail

addOrder

public Order addOrder(java.lang.String cashierName)
Add a new order to the list and print out the information. method will notify cooks waiting to get orders if the list is currently empty.

Parameters:
name - of the cashier

removeOrder

public Order removeOrder(java.lang.String cookName)
Removing an order from the list. The thread accessing this method is put on wait if the current list is empty. It will return information about the order being removed.

Parameters:
name - of the cook requesting order
Returns:
formatted String containing the information of the order.
